title: Can we just whip out the next patch already?
body: Cause fucking christ this game is so unfun right now...

replies.body: is this game ever actually fun?

Tbh it went down ever since the juggernaught update. 
From then on it's gotten worse and worse every season. 
It's not that i just lost interest or getting older or all the other blabla you will read here. 
It's just it feels more and more "unfair" to play, less and less impact on the game and solo carry ability unless playing faceroll champs like kata, riven, yasuo. 
Once you actually had to outplay and outskill your opponent, right now it is all about who gets: ryze, camille, vi, heca, poppy, riven, kata, lb, syndra and it's nearly an instant win.

juggernaut update?

It's been going downhill ever since they changed out the twisted treeline map, with the hill getting gradually steeper.

(I say still playing the game)

> [{quoted}](name=GayFluffyUnicorn,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UT88EF5U,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-01-08T22:14:08.858+0000)
> 
> It's just it feels more and more "unfair" to play, less and less impact on the game and solo carry ability unless playing faceroll champs like kata, riven, yasuo. 


All 3 of those champs aren't faceroll. Yasuo and Riven have always taken skill, and unlike old Kat, new Kat is fairly hard
May i ask what will they be doing to make the game better?

> [{quoted}](name=FingerFlavored,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UT88EF5U,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-01-08T18:39:47.870+0000)
>
> May i ask what will they be doing to make the game better?

I know for a fact they are nerfing the jg, which will make it much more enjoyable to play.

but this will hurt other champions that struggle with the current jungle anyways. I mean thank god WW is getting rework but until he's release he's gonna be complete assshit as getting to level 6 will now take longer. 

They never really fixed fiddle's sticks issue with the jungle. Idk why his fear doesn't just do AoE fear on the jungle monsters.

Jg's that don't have an early game power surge at lv 2 or 3 that need to get to 6 to be most effective (like diana ) will suffer greatly. They should just change the jungle back to the way it was and stop being so fucking stubborn for fucks sake it's childish as fuck how they refuse to just admit they fucked up and go back on something that wasn't broken.
yup, just got to further nerf the JG. As if it hasn't had all of its guts spilled all over the rift

> [{quoted}](name=Yalathanil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UT88EF5U,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2017-01-09T01:38:28.825+0000)
>
> yup, just got to further nerf the JG. As if it hasn't had all of its guts spilled all over the rift

Are you saying the jgs bad now??

*Geduld, bitte - grad ist Wochenende. Und jeder weiß: Freitag um eins macht jeder seins.*

Patience, please - it is weekend at the moment. And everyone knows: Everyone will do his own work on friday at 1 o'clock (sounds better in German, btw).

7.1 is hitting live on Wednesday morning if Riot sticks to their usual schedule. If they hurry up, it might even release on Tuesday morning, but that is rather rare.
Ich spreche deutsch nicht.

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UT88EF5U,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-01-08T18:30:03.821+0000)
>
> Ich spreche deutsch nicht.

~~I'm just a high school student learning German, aber ich denke, dass man sagt, „Ich spreche kein Deutsch.“~~

~~(I guess you might be doing that for comedic effect too.)~~

I'm mistaken.

Both is correct, though "Ich spreche kein Deutsch" is the more polite way to say it. It's just a very minor difference, nobody will get upset if you say "Ich spreche deutsch nicht" as it's a statement.

Source: I'm Austrian (so german is my native language)

> [{quoted}](name=MadKnife IV,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UT88EF5U,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2017-01-08T21:04:36.193+0000)
>
> Both is correct, though "Ich spreche kein Deutsch" is the more polite way to say it. It's just a very minor difference, nobody will get upset if you say "Ich spreche deutsch nicht" as it's a statement.
> 
> Source: I'm Austrian (so german is my native language)

Okay thank you! Now I know better.
I took one class in highschool, no worries if I made a few mistakes, I can only just remember a few words and grammar.

Läuft bei dir. Woher aus Deutschland? Im Norden kenne ich diese Redewendung noch nicht :(

But it is very likely that the next patch is going to release on Tuesday since the cycle is already over.

*Arbeite im Osten. Vielleicht kommt das daher?*

Yeah, let's hope for that.

~~But my freelo 5 Zz'Rot perma splitpushing strat is getting nerfed next patch~~

jk, that shit is so brainless and toxic it needs to be changed. It'll probably remain somewhat viable.

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UT88EF5U,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-01-08T22:44:46.333+0000)
>
> ~~But my freelo 5 Zz'Rot perma splitpushing strat is getting nerfed next patch~~
> 
> jk, that shit is so brainless and toxic it needs to be changed. It'll probably remain somewhat viable.

I played a game with my friends and we went 5 suport champions and all built zz'rot none of us did even as much damage as their lowest champ and we still one cause 5 zzrot push op
I'm pretty sure Zz'Rot is actually broken right now

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=UT88EF5U,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2017-01-09T09:20:57.308+0000)
>
> I'm pretty sure Zz'Rot is actually broken right now

basically can span like 1/3 of a lane and farms for you and takes down turrets, and has litterally no cool down unless destroyed by an enemy... nah not busted. I honestly buy it over GA
whats wrong
Yeah Riot really needs to just whip it out for us...
Wednesday.
i just wish they would revert the {{champion:38}}  changes... my poor child :(
yeah game so bad for awhile, at it's worst atm for whole month now and counting =^(
